data.title: Foundation for the Future of Delaware County
data.text:
We inspire people to give back to their community, helping them become more invested in its success today and tomorrow.

We learn about our community’s most pressing needs from those most affected by its challenges – things like access to affordable housing, quality childcare, and community resources, then partner with donors to work toward lasting solutions.

We build endowments to create permanent, locally controlled assets that support the work of local organizations and build their capacity to improve our region.

We strengthen Delaware County’s nonprofits—through funding, capacity-building and more—so they can make essential resources accessible to our entire community. We host more than 30 nonprofit endowment funds that provide a sustainable source of income to support organizations’ missions forever.

Community foundations are forever.

Our endowment funds are invested permanently, and the earnings from that investment provide annual funding to address our community’s greatest needs for generations to come. Learn more.

Our Impact

$167,000

Endowment payouts in 2023

$112,000

Foundation grants to 43 nonprofits in 2023

Community Investment

$710,000

Gifts in 2022

$4.6 million

Total assets

89%

Of total assets endowed

Thanks to our affiliation with the Community Foundation of Greater Dubuque, the Delaware County Foundation for the Future iis entrusted with the distribution of state gaming dollars to provide grants that ensure the nonprofits helping our community thrive can respond to emerging needs and sustain the good work they do. Learn about our grants.

Our work is fueled by people like you.

Together, we can realize a shared vision of a strong, thriving Delaware County for all.

When you make an endowed gift to the Foundation or any of its funds, it will cost you far less thanks to Iowa's generous Endow Iowa 25% state tax credit.

There are many ways to invest in your community — from monetary gifts to stock, grain, land or individual retirement account contributions. Gifts of all kinds and sizes move our region forward.

View our list of charitable funds or contact us for assistance.
